overview: The Boyg is the voice within that whispers go around, preventing you from facing yourself, suffocating progress and initiative.  A six minute visual and musical remix of Ibsens Peer Gynt, Norwegian Folklore, Edvard Griegs composition, paralyzing panic attacks and The Great Boyg itself who finds us all.
tagline: Peer Gynt: Who are you? The Boyg: Myself. Can you say the same?
title: The Boyg
